channel.title: Public warnings
channel.description: This new warning system is pretty cool, however it was really useful to be able to warn someone publicly. That way people could see what the person had done wrong and obviously try not to make the same mistake. Is there anyway that we can have this again?

moparisthebest.com

moparisthebest.com
